product_name: BLK/OPLEven True Pore Refining Gel Cleanser
summary: SummaryRefine and re-balance. This BLK/OPL Even True Pore Refining Gel Cleanser is a lightweight foaming cleanser that gently removes impurities and excess oil without stripping or over-drying.
details: DetailsBenefitsAn exclusive combination of pore-clarifying ingredients purify skin and minimizes pores for a smoother appearance cleanse skin and minimize pores for a smoother appearance.Key IngredientsAntioxidants Green Tea and Vitamin E help protect against damaging environmental elements while skin-brightening ingredients like Turmeric promote a glowing, healthy complexion.Item 2608011How To UseApply a nickel-sized amount of cleanser to the hands and gently suds, apply suds to damp skin on face/neck in a circular motion for 60 seconds, rinse thoroughly.Use twice daily morning and evening.Sunscreen should be used with this product.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Lactose, Capryloyl Glycine, Sarcosine, Salicylic Acid, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract , Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Nymphaea Alba Flower Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Algae Extract, Yeast Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Palmitoyl Proline, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Urea, Ethylhexylglycerin, Menthyl Lactate, Glucosamine HCl, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Ultramarines (CI 77007), Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Apply a nickel-sized amount of cleanser to the hands and gently suds, apply suds to damp skin on face/neck in a circular motion for 60 seconds, rinse thoroughly.Use twice daily morning and evening.Sunscreen should be used with this product.

reviews.headline: smells terrible
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this but it smelled so bad that I couldn't even finish washing my face with it. My face felt dry and tight after.

reviews.headline: Please fix faulty top but love product
reviews.comments:
Will buy again 
Please fix top
Smells great 
Works fast

rollup.name: Even True Pore Refining Gel Cleanser
